page.title: 04Parish Church of Askern
page.content: For years,perhaps hundreds of years, people have worshipped at St Peter's church, in the middle of Askern Market Place.Many people go there every day, and especially on Sundays. Early on Sunday Morning, as people approach Askern,they hear the church bells ringing,and they are a pleasant sound. On a Sunday there is also a Pathfinders group, a christian organi- sation for young people,led in our area by Mr J.J. Bradwell.Most of the people will know him,and he is also helped by other adults.Sunday School also occurs on the same day and this is led by a group of ladies such as the Vicar's wife,Mrs Margaret Noble. The church to most people who go there,is a major part of their life in Askern.
